answers.answer: So I guess I'm  just the only lucky one that's on hospitalized bed rest?!

I'm 28 week and in the hospital until I deliver, because I'm have cord blood flow issues, I'm doing fine because I know I'm in good hands,and I don't mind being here because I know they can keep a better eye on me !

Been in hospital since last Friday due to membrane rupture and water leakage. It was 32 weeks and 4 days. The first 4 night, I had to lay flat in bed only, wasn't allowed to get up. It was horrible. I was given steroid shots, magnesium sulfate, iv, and antibiotic.Doctor wants to deliver my baby at 34 weeks. So 2 more days to go until I meet my baby girl :)
Im not hospitalized but i do have preacclampsia and gestational diabetes,  on bed rest at home, wish time went by faster.....if you dont mind me asking what exactly do u mean by failing placenta?

question: Any other mothers on hospitalized bed rest?  I'm 31 weeks and 4 days.  Hospitalized for preeclampsia and failing placenta.  What's your story and how are you handling it?
title: Anyone Else?
